thread.title: Glenys Mccreath
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Glenys Mccreath

author: Glenys Mccreath
title: Glenys Mccreath
text:
Paula at GOWAY made everything easy, where on our own it had seemed almost impossible. She listened to the kinds of activities we had in mind, and accommodated us, one hundred percent! All arrangements made were carried out seemlessly, like clockwork.
We had a wonderful time - thanks GOWAY!
